Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class thrust::device_allocator< T >

device_allocator is a device memory allocator. This implementation inherits from device_new_allocator.

See also:
device_ptr
device_new_allocator
http://www.sgi.com/tech/stl/Allocators.html

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

template<typename T >
__host__ __device__ thrust::device_allocator< T >::device_allocator ( ) [inline]

No-argument constructor has no effect.

template<typename T >
__host__ __device__ thrust::device_allocator< T >::device_allocator ( device_allocator< T > const &  ) [inline]

Copy constructor has no effect.

template<typename T >
template<typename U >
__host__ __device__ thrust::device_allocator< T >::device_allocator ( device_allocator< U > const &  ) [inline]

Constructor from other allocator has no effect.
